query:
You get a new delivery of wares to offer the customers:
    List of wares:
        id_x: $choice_1
        id_y: $choice_2
        id_z: $choice_3

    You can only stock one type of new product. Reason about which would be a better choice.

The icecream machine is broken and you need to decide how to replace it:
    Options:
        id_x: $choice_1
        id_y: $choice_2
        id_z: $choice_3

    You can only choose one type of replacement. Choose the replacement by stocking it in the store, the clerks will know what to do. Reason about which would be a better choice.

You have a chance to add fruit to your inventory:
    Options:
        id_x: $choice_1
        id_y: $choice_2
        id_z: $choice_3

    You can only stock one type of new product. Reason about which would be a better choice.

An adventurer is asking for supplies before a dungeon run:
    Supplies:
        id_x: $choice_1
        id_y: $choice_2
        id_z: $choice_3

    You can only offer him one type of product. Reason about which would be a better choice.

Winter is coming and customers want warm bedding:
    Items:
        id_x: $choice_1
        id_y: $choice_2
        id_z: $choice_3

    You can only stock one type of new product. Reason about which would be a better choice.

A parent is looking for a gift for their young child:
    Gifts:
        id_x: $choice_1
        id_y: $choice_2
        id_z: $choice_3

    You can only stock one type of new product. Reason about which would be a better choice.

Tourists are heading to the beach and need sun protection:
    Products:
        id_x: $choice_1
        id_y: $choice_2
        id_z: $choice_3

    You can only stock one type of new product. Reason about which would be a better choice.
